fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are role-blockable.
- You are controllable.
- You are unique.
- Conversion Immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player during the day, target player is sent to Jail that night, where you may talk to them and decide to exile them. (inf uses)
- Select your target during the night, choose to exile them from the Kingdom, killing them. (2 use)
